mapper.insert: insert into member ( m_id, m_name, m_gender, m_birth, m_pwd, m_postcode, m_addr1, m_addr2, m_role ) values( #{mId}, #{mName}, #{mGender}, #{mBirth}, #{mPwd}, #{mPostcode}, #{mAddr1}, #{mAddr2}, #{mRole})
mapper.select: select count(*) from member where m_id = #{mId} and m_pwd = #{mPwd}
